entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Cowansville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:45 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Frelighsburg 08:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

Humidity: 75 %

Wind: SE 37 km/h gust 77 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High 10.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this morning then becoming southeast 30 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow overnight. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
